member.summary: Sets or get the error protection methods for Tile Part Headers (0,1,16,32,37-128).

member.summary: Sets or get the tile number of header protection specification (>=0).

member.summary: Sets or get the error protection methods for packets (0,1,16,32,37-128).

member.summary: Sets or get the packet number of packet protection specification (>=0).

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.JpwlPacketProtectionTileNumber
member.summary: Sets or get the tile number of packet protection specification (>=0).

member.summary: Sets or get the sensitivity methods for Tile Part Headers (-1=no,0-7).

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.JpwlSensitivityTilePartHeaderTileNo
member.summary: Sets or get the tile number of sensitivity specification (>=0).

member.summary: Sets or get the initial precinct height.

member.summary: Sets or get the initial precinct width.

member.summary: Sets or get the different PSNR (Peak signal-to-noise ratio) for successive layers.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.TcpRates
member.summary: Sets or get the rates of layers - might be subsequently limited by the max_cs_size field.

member.summary: Sets or get the initial code block height.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.CodeBlockWidthInitial
member.summary: Sets or get the initial code block width.

member.summary: Sets or get the output file format.

member.summary: Sets or get the Digital Cinema compliance.

member.summary: Sets or get the RSIZ.

member.summary: Sets or get the allocation by rate/distortion.

member.summary: Sets or get the allocation by fixed layer.

member.summary: Sets or get the add fixed quality.

member.summary: Sets or get the regions size

member.summary: Sets or get the XTsiz.

member.summary: Sets or get the YTsiz.

member.summary: Sets or get the XTOsiz.

member.summary: Sets or get the YTOsiz.

member.summary: Sets or get the coding style.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.DecodingFormat
member.summary: Sets or get the input file format.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.ImageOffsetX0
member.summary: Sets or get the subimage encoding: origin image offset in x direction.

member.summary: Sets or get the subimage encoding: origin image offset in y direction.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.IndexOn
member.summary: Sets or get the index generation.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.Irreversible
member.summary: Sets or get the value to indicate whether irreversible or not for compression.
member.remarks: true if use the irreversible DWT 9-7; otherwise, use lossless compression is false.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.JpwlHeaderProtectionMainHeader
member.summary: Sets or get the error protection method for Main Header (0,1,16,32,37-128).

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.JpwlSensitivityAddressing
member.summary: Sets or get the sensitivity addressing size (0=auto/2/4 bytes).

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.JpwlSensitivityMainHeader
member.summary: Sets or get the sensitivity method for Main Header (-1=no,0-7).

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.JpwlSensitivityRange
member.summary: Sets or get the sensitivity range (0-3).

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.JpwlSensitivitySize
member.summary: Sets or get the enables writing of ESD, (0=no/1/2 bytes).

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.MaximumComponentSize
member.summary: Sets or get the maximum size (in bytes) for each component.
member.remarks: Component size limitation is not considered if 0.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.MaximumCodestreamSize
member.summary: Sets or get the maximum size (in bytes) for the whole codestream.
member.remarks: If 0, codestream size limitation is not considered If it does not comply with , prevails and a warning is issued.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.Mode
member.summary: Sets or get the mode switch (codeblock coding style).

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.NumProgressionOrderChanges
member.summary: Sets or get the number of progression order changes (POC).

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.NumResolution
member.summary: Sets or get the number of resolutions.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.ProgressionOrder
member.summary: Sets or get the progression order.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.ResSpec
member.summary: Sets or get the number of precinct size specifications.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.RegionOfInterestComponent
member.summary: Sets or get the region of interest: affected component in [0..3], -1 means no ROI.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.RegionOfInterestShift
member.summary: Sets or get the region of interest: upshift value.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.SubsamplingDx
member.summary: Sets or get the subsampling value for dx.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.SubsamplingDy
member.summary: Sets or get the subsampling value for dy.

member.summary: Sets or get the number of layers.

member.summary: Sets or get whether enables JPIP indexing.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.JpwlEpcOn
member.summary: Sets or get whether enables writing of EPC in MH, thus activating JPWL.

member.name: P:OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters.TcpMCT
member.summary: Sets or get the MCT (multiple component transform).

member.summary: Sets or get the flag for Tile part generation.

member.name: T:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg
member.summary: Provides the methods of OpenJpeg.
Provides the methods of OpenJpeg.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.CreateCompress(OpenJpegDotNet.CodecFormat)
member.summary: Creates a J2K/JP2 compression structure.
member.returns: The .

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.StartCompress(OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,OpenJpegDotNet.Image,OpenJpegDotNet.Stream)
member.summary: Start to compress the current image.
member.param: The image that receives encoded datum.
member.returns: true if the start to compress is correctly set; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.EndCompress(OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,OpenJpegDotNet.Stream)
member.summary: End to compress the current image.
member.returns: true if the end to compress is correctly set; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.Encode(OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,OpenJpegDotNet.Stream)
member.summary: Encode an image into a JPEG-2000 codestream.
member.returns: true if the end to compress is correctly set; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.SetDefaultEncoderParameters(OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters)
member.summary: Set encoding parameters to default values.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.SetupEncoder(OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,OpenJpegDotNet.CompressionParameters,OpenJpegDotNet.Image)
member.summary: Setup the encoder with compression parameters provided by the user and with the message handler provided by the user.
member.returns: true if the decoder is correctly set; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.CreateDecompress(OpenJpegDotNet.CodecFormat)
member.summary: Creates a J2K/JP2 decompression structure.
member.returns: The .

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.Decode(OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,OpenJpegDotNet.Stream,OpenJpegDotNet.Image)
member.summary: Decode an image from a JPEG 2000 codestream.
member.param: The image that receives decoded datum.
member.returns: true if success; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.EndDecompress(OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,OpenJpegDotNet.Stream)
member.summary: Read after the codestream if necessary.
member.returns: true if success; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.ReadHeader(OpenJpegDotNet.Stream,OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,OpenJpegDotNet.Image@)
member.summary: Decodes an image header.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the read from stream. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: true if the main header of the codestream and the JP2 header is correctly read; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.SetDecodeArea(OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,OpenJpegDotNet.Image,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Sets the given area to be decoded.
member.param: The left position of the rectangle to decode in image.
The top position of the rectangle to decode in image.
The right position of the rectangle to decode in image.
The bottom position of the rectangle to decode in image.
member.returns: true if the area is correctly set; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.SetDefaultDecoderParameters(OpenJpegDotNet.DecompressionParameters)
member.summary: Set decoding parameters to default values.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.SetupDecoder(OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,OpenJpegDotNet.DecompressionParameters)
member.summary: Setup the decoder with decompression parameters provided by the user and with the message handler provided by the user.
member.returns: true if the decoder is correctly set; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.CodecSetThreads(OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,System.Int32)
member.summary: Allocates worker threads for the compressor/decompressor.
member.param: The to compress or decompress image.
member.returns: true if the function succeeds; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: This function must be called after and before for the decoding side, or after () and before for the encoding side.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.WriteTile(OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.UInt32,OpenJpegDotNet.Stream)
member.summary: Writes a tile with the given data.
member.param: The index of the tile to write.
The buffer to the data to write.
The length of datum to write. This value os used to make sure the data being written is correct.
The stream to write data to.
member.returns: true if the data could be written; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.GetVersion
member.summary: Get the string representation of the OpenJpeg version.
member.returns: The string representation of the OpenJpeg version.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.GetNativeVersion
member.summary: Get the string representation of the version of wrapper library of OpenJpeg.
member.returns: The string representation of the version of wrapper library of OpenJpeg.

member.summary: Set the info handler.

The client object where will be returned the message.

member.summary: Set the warning handler.
